name: Dungeon Man (NV_Navnit)
description:
Based on classic NES style Legend of Zelda, this game will task the player to navigate through rooms and defeat enemies. Currently, however, I'm still working on combat and animations. For now, all that the player can do is move around. New mechanics are planned to be added in the future.

This is the first game I've ever worked on for itch.io and it's still very much a work in progress. I appreciate any comments on what to improve on. Thank you for taking the time to try this game out, even if it's not complete!
